ActJudges Act
SubjectRamona Hewak ** ANNUITY ** The Hon. Benjamin Hewak **
PrecisGranting of an ANNUITY to RAMONA HEWAK, widow of the Hon. Benjamin Hewak, a puisne Judge of Her Majesty’s Court of Queen’s Bench for Manitoba, effective December 22, 2017.
AttachmentsAttachment
